item.introduce_en: The classic American favorite, we make ours with lots of 60% chocolate chunks
item.preservation_en: Room temperature for 1 week or storing them in the freezer they can be simply defrosted before eating
item.introduce_ch: 最經典的軟餅乾口味，麵團有微微香草味和60%巧克力塊
item.preservation_ch: 室溫可放一周。天氣溼熱時請冷凍，要吃的時候直接退冰就好囉！
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素(含蛋，奶油，巧克力)

item.introduce_en: Can’t beat a classic, and our carrot cake is unbeatably moist, with perfectly tangy cream cheese frosting.
item.preservation_en: 4 hours at room temperature, 3-4 days refrigerated, 2 weeks frozen
item.introduce_ch: 美國非常經典的口味，滿滿的紅蘿蔔絲和肉桂香氣融合，內霜帶一點檸檬酸味的奶油乳酪，對亞洲人是比較新鮮的口感，歡迎嘗鮮~
item.preservation_ch: 常溫4個小時，冷藏3-4天，冷凍2個禮拜
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素(含蛋，乳製品，小麥，芥花油，肉桂和其他香料)

item.introduce_en: A rich chocolate delight paired with sweet sour tones of raspberry jam and a crunchy layer of crumble inside
item.preservation_en: 4 hours at room temperature, 3-4 days refrigerated, 2 weeks frozen
item.introduce_ch: 邪惡的蛋糕就是巧克力蛋糕體再加上巧克力霜再加上脆脆巧克力片~ 中間的覆盆子果醬讓甜中有一點酸酸的平衡
item.preservation_ch: 常溫4個小時，冷藏3-4天，冷凍2個禮拜
item.composition_ch: 含吉利丁，蛋，乳製品，小麥

item.preservation_en: 2 hours at room temperature, 3-4 days refrigerated, 2 weeks frozen
item.preservation_ch: 常溫2個小時，冷藏3-4天，冷凍2個禮拜
item.composition_ch: 含吉利丁，乳製品，小麥

item.introduce_en: Can’t beat a red velvet cupcake to satisfy that sweet tooth! This crumbly cocoa cake base with a heap of coconut pecan frosting hits just right~
item.preservation_en: 4 hours at room temperature, 3-4 days refrigerated, 2 weeks frozen
item.introduce_ch: 紅絲絨蛋糕是美國很經典有趣的蛋糕口口味，傳統的紅色顏色是用甜菜根做出來的！濕潤的可可蛋糕體加上椰子胡桃糖霜，真是個吃不膩的組合！
item.preservation_ch: 常溫4小時，冷藏3-4天，冷凍2個禮拜
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，椰子，胡桃，甜菜根，紅#40食用色素)

item.introduce_en: Caramel cake + caramel frosting + caramel drizzled on top, with a sweet and sour apple filling inside, a melt-in-your-mouth combination!
item.preservation_en: 4 hours at room temperature, 3-4 days refrigerated, 2 weeks frozen
item.introduce_ch: 焦糖蛋糕體+焦糖霜+焦糖醬，還有裡面酸酸甜甜的蘋果餡，超有秋天的氣氛！
item.preservation_ch: 常溫4小時，冷藏3-4天，冷凍2個禮拜
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，芥花油，蘋果，少於1.5g酒精)

item.preservation_en: Storing in an airtight container 2-3 weeks at room temperature.
item.preservation_ch: 保鮮盒裡常溫2-3周
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋, 乳製品, 小麥)

item.preservation_en: Storing in an airtight container 3-4 days at room temperature.
item.preservation_ch: 保鮮盒裡常溫3-4天
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥)

item.item_ch: 波本威士忌無花果磅蛋糕
item.preservation_en: Storing in an airtight container 3-4 days at room temperature.
item.preservation_ch: 保鮮盒裡常溫3-4天
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，芥花油，4g酒精，無花果)

item.preservation_en: Storing in an airtight container 3-4 days at room temperature.
item.preservation_ch: 保鮮盒裡常溫3-4天
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，芥花油，香蕉，核桃)

item.introduce_en: A good ol’ fashioned apple pie never disappoints!
item.preservation_en: 2-3 days at room temperature
item.introduce_ch: 經典美式蘋果派就是這樣, 裡面面滿滿的蘋果片還有肉肉桂香氣~
item.preservation_ch: 常溫2-3天
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，肉桂和其他香料)

item.introduce_en: Not a pizza, sorry! Our tomato galette is basil, olives, garlic, parmesan, sun-dried and fresh tomatoes all wrapped up in a heavenly flaky pie crust
item.preservation_en: Storing in an airtight container 2-3 days at room temperature.
item.introduce_ch: 這可不是pizza喔！番茄鹹塔是用脆脆酥香的派皮包住羅勒勒，蒜，綠橄欖，日曬番茄乾和新鮮番茄片, 還有帕瑪森起司
item.preservation_ch: 保鮮盒裡常溫2-3天
item.composition_ch: 五辛素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，橄欖，酸豆，蒜，帕瑪森起司，羅勒)

item.introduce_en: Our buttery, flaky southern biscuits come with a refreshing scoop of house-made peach jam and whipped honey butter for that delicious salty-sweet combination!
item.preservation_en: 3-4 days at room temperature
item.introduce_ch: 又酥又香的美國南方比司吉有時候會被誤認為是司康，但兩個是不一樣的喔!比司吉酥軟，有淡淡的奶油鹹味，搭配我們自製的蜂蜜奶油和清爽水蜜桃果醬，品嚐鹹和甜的完美組合
item.preservation_ch: 常溫3-4天
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含乳製品，小麥)

item.introduce_en: These sweet and sour lemon muffins taste as good as they look, with a sprinkle of crunchy sugar on top and tangy lemon fragrance in every bite!
item.preservation_en: Storing in an airtight container 3-4 days at room temperature.
item.introduce_ch: 酸酸甜甜的檸檬瑪芬，上面灑著脆脆的冰糖，每一口都有濃濃的檸檬香味！
item.preservation_ch: 保鮮盒裡常溫3-4天
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，芥花油)

item.introduce_en: Pile some pear jam onto these raisin bran muffins for a healthy, hearty, and most importantly, scrumptious breakfast. Each muffin contains up to 6 grams of fiber!
item.preservation_en: Storing in an airtight container 3-4 days at room temperature.
item.introduce_ch: 在葡萄乾麩皮皮瑪芬上塗一匙果醬(洋梨果醬)，擁有健康又美味的早餐! 一個瑪芬有6公克的膳食纖維喔~
item.preservation_ch: 保鮮盒裡常溫3-4天
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，芥花油，麩皮，葡萄乾，雅麻子，柳橙)

item.introduce_en: Our cinnamon rolls are loaded with rich maple glaze, an inspiration from amazing American donuts we still can’t forget
item.preservation_en: 2 days at room temperature
item.introduce_ch: 美式甜點當然不能少了肉桂捲，我們靈感來自於美國的甜甜圈，把香甜的楓糖霜淋淋在肉桂捲上~
item.preservation_ch: 常溫2天 (建議盡快吃完口感最佳)
item.composition_ch: 蛋奶素 (含蛋，乳製品，小麥，肉桂)
